title: Malicious dependency mimics popular package
description: The package `requests-plus` mimics the well-known `requests` library and steals environment variables upon installation.
label: AV-200

title: Dependency confusion in internal repo
description: A public package with the same name as an internal library was uploaded to npm, leading to execution in the CI pipeline.
label: AV-509

title: Unicode characters in pull request hide payload
description: Invisible Unicode control characters were used in a Python file, changing the visual meaning of the logic in the PR.
label: AV-300

title: Code execution during install
description: The package `installer-script` runs malicious shell commands from its `setup.py` file at install time.
label: AV-400

title: Malicious build script commits credentials
description: A contributor added a build step that silently commits AWS credentials from the CI environment to their repo.
label: AV-410

title: Malicious Composer Package 'symfont/process'
description: The package 'symfont/process' mimics the popular 'symfony/process' package, representing a typosquatting attack.
label: AV-200

title: pipreqs Vulnerable to Dependency Confusion
description: A dependency confusion vulnerability in pipreqs allowed attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a crafted PyPI package.
label: AV-509

title: Trojan Source Attack Using Unicode Control Characters
description: Invisible Unicode control characters were used to perform Trojan Source attacks, manipulating code logic.
label: AV-300

title: Classic Builder Cache Poisoning in Docker
description: A Docker cache poisoning attack using typosquatted image names allowed execution of untrusted images during CI builds.
label: AV-400

title: Poisoned Pipeline Execution in Apache Superset
description: Apache Superset was vulnerable to a Poisoned Pipeline Execution attack, potentially compromising the CI pipeline.
label: AV-410
